search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Refersion (refersion.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Refersion is located at: [https://www.refersion.com/pricing](https://www.refersion.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Affiliate & Influencer Marketing Software Pricing | Refersion

extracted_content.content:
Affiliate and Influencer Marketing Plans and Pricing
----------------------------------------------------

Every plan provides accurate and reliable tracking, reporting and recruitment tools to help you manage and grow your program. Choose the option to fit your sales volume and growth goals.

Starter
-------

**Up to 10 Monthly Order Conversions**

Just getting your feet wet?  
The Starter plan is a  
good fit for brands just  
starting their affiliate  
program.

$29 /mo

IF PAID ANNUALLY

**$49 per month if paid monthly**

Professional
------------

**Up to 50 Monthly Order Conversions**

Ready to grow? The Professional plan is a good  
fit for small but growing  
affiliate programs.

$99 /mo

IF PAID ANNUALLY

**$119 per month if paid monthly**

Business
--------

**Up to 200 Monthly Order Conversions**

Ready shift into high gear?  
The Business plan is ideal  
for affiliate programs that  
are gaining momentum.

$249 /mo

IF PAID ANNUALLY

**$299 per month if paid monthly**

Custom
------

**Unlimited Monthly Order Conversions**

The Custom plan includes additional custom  
functionality for thriving affiliate programs looking to simplify and automate their workflows.

Let’s talk

**Affiliate suggestions, guided onboarding and no platform limits.**

Full Plan Features
------------------

| Affiliates and Affiliate Resources | Starter | Professional | Business | Custom |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Monthly Conversions/Sales** | 10 | 50 | 200 | Unlimited |
| **Active affiliates** | 50 | 200 | 500 | Unlimited |
| **Clicks** | 300 | 1000 | 5000 | Unlimited |

### We work with your complete ecommerce marketing tech stack

*   30+ Turnkey Integrations, including Amazon and Shopify
*   2,000+ App Integrations powered by Zapier
*   Commerce Tools and more

Getting started is easy
-----------------------

Setup your own account or schedule a call with our team. We’ll get you up and running in no-time.

Check out Refersion's pricing today. Choose the plan that's right for your affiliate marketing sales volume!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual pricing offers a discount compared to monthly pricing. Custom plan requires direct contact for pricing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Good fit for brands just starting their affiliate program.
Good fit for small but growing affiliate programs.
Ideal for affiliate programs that are gaining momentum.
Includes additional custom functionality for thriving affiliate programs.

extracted_content.content:
Affiliate and Influencer Marketing Plans and Pricing
----------------------------------------------------

Every plan provides accurate and reliable tracking, reporting and recruitment tools to help you manage and grow your program. Choose the option to fit your sales volume and growth goals.

Starter
-------

**Up to 10 Monthly Order Conversions**

Just getting your feet wet?  
The Starter plan is a  
good fit for brands just  
starting their affiliate  
program.

$29 /mo

IF PAID ANNUALLY

**$49 per month if paid monthly**

Professional
------------

**Up to 50 Monthly Order Conversions**

Ready to grow? The Professional plan is a good  
fit for small but growing  
affiliate programs.

$99 /mo

IF PAID ANNUALLY

**$119 per month if paid monthly**

Business
--------

**Up to 200 Monthly Order Conversions**

Ready shift into high gear?  
The Business plan is ideal  
for affiliate programs that  
are gaining momentum.

$249 /mo

IF PAID ANNUALLY

**$299 per month if paid monthly**

Custom
------

**Unlimited Monthly Order Conversions**

The Custom plan includes additional custom  
functionality for thriving affiliate programs looking to simplify and automate their workflows.

Let’s talk

**Affiliate suggestions, guided onboarding and no platform limits.**

Full Plan Features
------------------

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual pricing offers a discount compared to monthly pricing. Custom plan requires direct contact for pricing.
